https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/53L9u6adAZjifzTe7NIJSsoTvtS.jpg Radha's life takes a downward spiral after her mother is killed. Fate brings her to the city and she gets a job as a house help. Things change when she falls in love with the handsome owner. Bastir Meye Radha
